description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_URL_003` |
| **Name** | Open redirect via redirect param |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | url_param |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details
